name: CelCoin
description: CelCoin adopted the creation of a new cryptocurrency in the Crypto Ecosystem, we focused first on embodying the philosophy of Satoshi Nakamoto. CelCoin is the first 100% Hispanic-American cryptocurrency and the only one born with an extensive network of adoptability and usability. That is why, we intend that CelCoin (CELC) be from the first day, digital cash, here and now!
